suite.name: Testsuites

test.name: UI authentication Formerly guest info when invited adult

kw.name: Open Browser to Landing Page
kw.doc: A general startup keyword for opening a browser to the landing page.

kw.name: New Browser
kw.doc: Create a new playwright Browser with specified options.

kw.name: Set Browser Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout used by most input and getter keywords.

kw.name: New Context
kw.doc: Create a new BrowserContext with specified options.
kw.msg: { "acceptDownloads": true, "bypassCSP": false, "forcedColors": "none", "hideRfBrowser": false, "ignoreHTTPSErrors": false, "javaScriptEnabled": true, "offline": false, "reducedMotion": "no-preference", "viewport": { "height": 720, "width": 1280 }, "deprecated_pos_args": [] }

{'acceptDownloads': True, 'bypassCSP': False, 'forcedColors': 'none', 'hideRfBrowser': False, 'ignoreHTTPSErrors': False, 'javaScriptEnabled': True, 'offline': False, 'reducedMotion': 'no-preference', 'viewport': {'height': 720, 'width': 1280}, 'deprecated_pos_args': []}

kw.name: New Page
kw.doc: Open a new Page.
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: https://test3.omenahotels.com/

kw.name: Wait Until Network Is Idle
kw.doc: Waits until there has been at least one instance of 500 ms of no network traffic on the page after loading.

kw.name: Allow Cookies
kw.doc: Allow Cookies/Toggle Cookie allowance

kw.name: Is Element Found
kw.doc: A keyword that has a very complex way of figuring out whether an element is found or not because I had trouble with the built-in keywords Can be solved differently if you have a better idea

kw.name: Set Browser Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout used by most input and getter keywords.

kw.name: Get Elements
kw.doc: Returns a reference to Playwright [https://playwright.dev/docs/api/class-locator|Locator] for all matched elements by ``selector``.

kw.name: Get Length
kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Browser Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout used by most input and getter keywords.

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Get Url
kw.doc: Returns the current URL.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Select Hotel
kw.doc: Select Hotel by using a number as an argument, default Lönnrotinkatu

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.

kw.name: Click Continue to Extras Button
kw.doc: Clicks the continue to extras button

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: TimeoutError: locator.click: Timeout 90000ms exceeded. =========================== logs =========================== waiting for locator('xpath=(//div[contains(@view,"booking")]//button[contains(text(), "Continue to extras")])[1]') locator resolved to <button disabled type="button" class="chakra-button css-…>Continue to extras</button> attempting click action waiting for element to be visible, enabled and stable element was detached from the DOM, retrying locator resolved to <button disabled type="button" class="chakra-button css-…>Continue to extras</button> attempting click action waiting for element to be visible, enabled and stable element is not enabled - waiting... ============================================================ Tip: Use "Set Browser Timeout" for increasing the timeout or double check your locator as the targeted element(s) couldn't be found.

kw.name: Wait Until Visible
kw.doc: An easier keyword for waiting until an element is visible

kw.name: Select Web Bank and Nordea as Payment Method
Booker is main guest and completes check-in process
Verify Invite guest popup UI when guest is adult
Fill in guest information when guest is adult
Verify Invite guest UI after invite
Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.status: TimeoutError: locator.click: Timeout 90000ms exceeded. =========================== logs =========================== waiting for locator('xpath=(//div[contains(@view,"booking")]//button[contains(text(), "Continue to extras")])[1]') locator resolved to <button disabled type="button" class="chakra-button css-…>Continue to extras</button> attempting click action waiting for element to be visible, enabled and stable element was detached from the DOM, retrying locator resolved to <button disabled type="button" class="chakra-button css-…>Continue to extras</button> attempting click action waiting for element to be visible, enabled and stable element is not enabled - waiting... ============================================================ Tip: Use "Set Browser Timeout" for increasing the timeout or double check your locator as the targeted element(s) couldn't be found.
